data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample CHURCPGL-111

Exposition N, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Fluvioglaziale Ablagerung Gneis und Granit, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 15%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 70%, Vegatation type: Lockerer, sehr alter PCGL-Bestand, Film number: 826A
